docs.snippet: Less than 10 months after Tommy John surgery, Matt Harvey threw 20 pitches off the mound at the team’s training facility in Florida and said, “I didn’t think things would feel this good and easy.”...

docs.snippet: Rodriguez’s new conciliatory approach is personified by Jim Sharp, his measured and respected criminal lawyer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodriguez’s new conciliatory approach is personified by Jim Sharp, his measured and respected criminal lawyer.
docs.abstract: Alex Rodriguez has abandoned highly combative tone and strategy that made headlines for long period following his year-long doping suspension; new conciliatory approach, exemplified in his hiring of measured and respected criminal lawyer Jim Sharp, indicates that Rodriguez is now seeking a more amicable relationship with the New York Yankees and MLB's leaders.

headline.main: Alex Rodriguez Tries a New Legal Approach: Conciliation
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Tries a New Legal Approach: Conciliation

docs.snippet: Anthony P. Bosch was charged on Tuesday with distributing the anabolic steroid testosterone to hundreds of people, including high school athletes and professional athletes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony P. Bosch was charged on Tuesday with distributing the anabolic steroid testosterone to hundreds of people, including high school athletes and professional athletes.
docs.abstract: Anthony P Bosch, founder of Biogenesis and troubled businessman at center of South Florida doping scandal, surrenders to Drug Enforcement Administration agents; prosecutors charge Bosch and a half-dozen of his associates with distributing anabolic steroid testosterone to hundreds of people, including high school athletes and multimillionaire superstars.

headline.seo: Anthony Bosch to Plead Guilty to Distributing Steroids

byline.contributor: Frances Robles contributed reporting from Miami.
